info.title: Spotify_Scraper_Get_Artist_Overview
info.description: Retrieve an overview of an artist from Spotify based on the artist ID.

get.description: Retrieve an overview of an artist from Spotify based on the artist ID.

status.description: Indicates the success or failure of the request.

errorId.description: String identifier for any error encountered, if applicable.

id.description: Unique Spotify ID of the artist.

shareUrl.description: URL to the Spotify artist page.

verified.description: Indicates if the artist is verified on Spotify.

externalLinks.description: External URL liked to the artist.

visuals.description: Pictures, covers and avatars relaed to the artist.

relatedContent.description: Other related content for this artist like the songs the artists features on, appears on etc.

goods.description: Any concerts and merch sold by the artist.
